content: Have there been any updates to how #[macro] mod foo; should be handled since 2018, the last time it was mentioned in the proc_macro_hygiene tracking issue? Inner attributes seem to have even more issues, either resolution for this situation would at least make the use-case feasible. Expand-in-place would be easy, but the WYSIWYG way would also work as the macro could just parse and include the file itself (ugly, but would work).
